content: OK SORRY DIREWOLF YOU ARE RIGHT MEMBERS SHOULD NOT EARN MONEY OR HAVE MONEY ON A FORUM DEDICATED TO DECENTRALIZED CURRENCY OF 10 TRILLION VOLUMEI ADMIT NOW I WAS TRYING TO TAKE COLLATERAL VALUE OF 0.5$ USDT TO BUY COOKIES AND MILK FOR MYSELF

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Hello to you, you are a new member of the forum with no reputation so you have to give no collateral loans at first to maybe gain some. Who says you won't take the collateral and run away? I'm not saying you will, but it exists as a possibility.

comments.author: chillaxe
comments.body: Quote from: alterra57 on May 23, 2023, 10:30:16 AMHello to you, you are a new member of the forum with no reputation so you have to give no collateral loans at first to maybe gain some. Who says you won't take the collateral and run away? I'm not saying you will, but it exists as a possibility.Hello alterra57, Loans with no collateral wont be given, I reserve the right to offer a service on my terms without someone changing the terms of the given service.No I dont "have to" give out loans to anyone who asks me to, especialy not on their own terms " made up on the spot by them/you ".Well look about me taking a collateral and "starting to run away on the internet" lol. The ammount is set to 10$ - 100$ , So I think even a complete newbie on the forum should be given the benefit of doubt in regards to deals.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.created_time: May 23, 2023, 06:50:01 PMLast edit: May 23, 2023, 10:04:26 PM by DireWolfM14
comments.body: Aw, how cute!  Two brand new accounts engaging in a collateral loan.  The fact that both accounts were registered within days of each other, less than a month ago couldn't possibly indicate that they are operated by the same person, and this is nothing but a staged, fake loan with staged, fake collateral...  That would be impossible, right?WARNING!Potential collateral scam!Never send your collateral to a new, untrusted user!Insist on using a trusted, reputable escrow provider!!

comments.author: chillaxe
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on May 23, 2023, 06:50:01 PMAw, how cute!  Two brand new accounts engaging in a collateral loan.  The fact that both accounts were registered within days of each other, less than a month ago couldn't possibly indicate that they are operated by the same person, and this is nothing but a staged, fake loan with staged, fake collateral...  That would be impossible, right?WARNING!Potential collateral scam!Never send your collateral to a new, untrusted user!Insist on using a trusted, reputable escrow provider!! I have a full member account from 2017. Just I dont know the password or email.

comments.body: Quote from: Timelord2067 on May 24, 2023, 11:23:56 AM~Wallet is empty and was last used three days ago.https://etherscan.io/address/0x0eb0ce1a09b0afbe1fe69a91ec2eaa2ceda7d2c4Not to mention that the lent amount was supposedly sent 17 minutes before the recipient's address was posted.  Quote from: chillaxe on May 23, 2023, 06:55:38 AMOK SORRY DIREWOLF YOU ARE RIGHT MEMBERS SHOULD NOT EARN MONEY OR HAVE MONEY ON A FORUM DEDICATED TO DECENTRALIZED CURRENCY OF 10 TRILLION VOLUMEI ADMIT NOW I WAS TRYING TO TAKE COLLATERAL VALUE OF 0.5$ USDT TO BUY COOKIES AND MILK FOR MYSELFThat's rather cheap for milk and cookies, but okay, lets check out your original post:Quote from: https://ninjastic.space/post/62287257Hello to everyone in this section.I can offer short term small loans to those who would like to put up altcoins or even meme coins as colateralLoans not more than 100$ USDTLoan return period 7 days.✅Colateral ammount must be more than loan ammount 110%.✅All fees will be payed by the recipient of loan ✅So, 110% of $15 is $0.5?  I think you better quit lying or learn some math.  Either way, things aren't likely to end well.
